name: Ukiyo
description: Japanese cuisine with a modern twist, offering dishes like sushi, rame, tempura, and soba in a sophisticated ambiance!

name: Copper Chimney
description: Renowned for its North Indian and Mughlai dishes, inluding biryanis and succulent kebabs!

name: The Burger House
description: A go-to place for gourmet burgers with a variety of fillings, served in a fast-food style!

name: TGI Fridays
description: Offering a variety of Mexican dishes, including fajitas and quesadillas, in a casual dining atmosphere.

name: Baan Tao
description: Offers a serene ambiance with a menu featuring Chinese and other Asian delicacies!

name: Barbeque Nation
description: Renowned for its live grill concept, offering a wide range of vegetarian and non-vegetarian barbecued dishes in a vibrant atmosphere!

name: Lifestyle
description: Known for its healthy and organic menu options, including smoothies, salads, and specialty coffees, all served in a serene environment!

name: Fish Curry Rice
description: Known for its homestyle Maharashtrian seafood, offers a variety of traditional dishes in a simple and cozy setting!

name: the French Window Patisserie
description: Known for its charming ambiance and open-air seating. Offers a delightful array of breakfast dishes and a variety of cakes, including frosted, mousse, and seasonal specialties!

name: Little Italy
description: Renowned for its extensive vegetarian Italian menu, including a wide selection of pizzas, pastas, and desserts!

name: Koji
description: Premier Pan-Asian restaurant serving authentic Japanese, Chinese, and Thai dishes!

name: The Great Kabab Factory
description: Specializes in a variety of delectable kebabs, offering a unique dining experience for meat lovers.!

name: Epitome
description: Offers a variety of fast-food options, including sandwiches and quick meals!

name: Laa Unico
description: Serving a fusion of Mexican and Italian cuisines, known for its innovative dishes and vibrant ambiance!

name: Mainland China
description: Known for its extensive Chinese menu and contemporary decor!

name: Absolute Barbecues
description: Features a unique 'do-it-yourself' grilling experience with an extensive buffet of meats, seafood, and vegetables.!

name: The Flour Works
description: Offers a cozy ambiance with a menu featuring European and Continental dishes, along with freshly baked goods and artisanal coffee!

name: Gajalee
description: Offers a range of Malvani and Maharashtrian seafood specialties in a comfortable setting!

name: Le Plaisir
description: Offering a range of delectable desserts like pastries, tarts, and cakes. The monochrome interior and blackboard menus add to its sophisticated charm!

name: Squisito
description: Offers a cozy setting with a menu featuring a variety of pizzas, pastas, and other Italian favorites, making it a popular spot for authentic Italian dining!

name: Gong
description: Modern take on traditional Japanese cuisine including dishes like Ebi tempura rolls and vegetable rystal rolls!

name: Wah Marathi
description: Serves authentic Maharashtrian cuisine, allowing guests to savor traditional regional flavors in a contemporary setting!

name: Toit
description: A microbrewery and pub offering a variety of fast-food options alongside their craft beers!

name: The Bridge
description: An upscale dining venue offering a selection of Mexican dishes in a sophisticated environment!

name: Kimling
description: Authentic Chinese flavors and cozy dining environment!

name: Fire & Smoke
description: specializes in barbecue cuisine, offering a cozy ambiance and a variety of grilled delicacies!

name: Cafe Goodluck
description: One of Pune's oldest Irani caf√©s, famous for its bun maska and Iranian tea!

name: Cafe Goa
description: Serves authentic Goan seafood, providing a taste of Goa in Pune!

name: Pune Baking Company
description: Offers a selection of freshly baked goods, desserts, and beverages. Known for its quality and variety, it's a favorite spot for dessert enthusiast!

name: Sorriso
description: Known for its traditional Italian cuisine, including risottos, ravioli, and wood-fired pizzas, all served in a sophisticated atmosphere!

name: Harajuku
description: Brings Tokyo's street-food staples to Pune, offering live teppanyaki counters and a range of sushi and sashimi!

name: Mosaic
description: Offers a diverse buffet with Indian and international cuisines, perfect for family gatherings!

name: Burgs
description: A fast-food chain serving a variety of gourmet burgers, including vegetarian options!

name: Polka Dots
description: Known for its diverse menu, including Mexican favorites like enchiladas and burritos, served in a cozy setting!

name: Wishpering Bamboo
description: Offers a fine dining experience with a focus on Chinese cuisine!

name: FulFil
description: Offers a diverse barbecue menu in a casual dining setting, known for its flavorful grills!

name: Alfresco
description: Offers a range of Mexican fast food, including tacos and burritos, suitable for a quick and satisfying meal!

name: Mahesh Lunch Home
description: Specializes in Mangalorean seafood dishes, serving a wide range of coastal specialties in a family-friendly environment!

name: Sassy Teaspoon
description: Offers a wide variety of artisanal desserts, from classic favorites like red velvet and chocolate cakes to unique creations like salted caramel and Nutella pastries!

name: Alto Vino
description: Offers a fine dining experience with a menu featuring classic Italian dishes crafted with authentic ingredients!

name: Shizusan
description: Menu that introduces refreshing fusions to authentic Japanese flavors featuring items like dynamic shrimp and rainbow maki!

name: Zeera
description: Specializes in North Indian cuisine, offering a luxurious dining experience with a curated menu!

name: Wadeshwar
description: Offers a range of quick South Indian dishes in a contemporary setting, perfect for a fast meal!

name: Taco Bell
description: A globally recognized chain offering quick-service Mexican-inspired dishes like tacos, burritos, and quesadillas!

name: Chinese Room
description: Known for its traditional Chinese dishes and has been a longstanding favorite among locals!

name: Barbeque Deck
description: Offers North Indian and barbecue cuisines, providing a rooftop dining experience with live grills!

name: Vohuman Cafe
description: Renowned for its classic Irani chai, cheese omelette, and bun maska, offering a nostalgic ambiance that has attracted patrons for decades!

name: The Sea Secret
description: Offering a diverse seafood menu, The Sea Secret is praised for its flavorful dishes and inviting atmosphere!

name: German Bakery
description: Serving a mix of Continental and Indian dishes, along with an array of baked goods, in a vibrant and eclectic setting!

name: Dario's Trattoria
description: Situated in Koregaon Park, Dario's Trattoria offers a range of Italian dishes, including pizzas and pastas, in a warm and inviting atmosphere!
